info.name: Connectra API Copy
info.description: Complete Postman collection for Connectra API. Includes Authentication, Billing, Usage, User Management, Companies, and Contacts endpoints. Includes full CRUD operations (create, update, delete, upsert, bulk) for both contacts and companies. Includes full CRUD operations (create, update, delete, upsert, bulk) for both contacts and companies. Includes full CRUD operations (create, update, delete, upsert, bulk) for both contacts and companies. Includes full CRUD operations (create, update, delete, upsert, bulk) for both contacts and companies. Includes full CRUD operations (create, update, delete, upsert, bulk) for both contacts and companies. All endpoints documented in connectra/docs/api/. Sample parameters align with the API documentation.

request.description: Simple health check endpoint used during scaffolding.
Database connection pool health check endpoint.
Return an empty favicon response to silence browser requests.
Present a placeholder admin endpoint to satisfy integration probes. Requires admin access.

item.name: Companies

request.description:
Search and retrieve companies based on VQL (Vivek Query Language) filter criteria. Uses hybrid search approach combining Elasticsearch for fast filtering and PostgreSQL for detailed data retrieval.

**Note**: This is a legacy route (not under /api/v2/).

Get the total count of companies matching the filter criteria.

**Note**: This is a legacy route (not under /api/v2/).

Retrieve all available filter metadata for companies.

**Note**: This is a legacy route (not under /api/v2/).

Retrieve available values for a specific filter (useful for dropdowns/autocomplete).

**Note**: This is a legacy route (not under /api/v2/).

exec: console.warn('No API key set. Please set the apiKey collection variable.');
// Save UUIDs from response if available
// Response might not be JSON or might not have UUID

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Acme Software Corp",
  "normalized_domain": "acme.com",
  "employees_count": 120,
  "industries": [
    "Software",
    "Technology"
  ],
  "keywords": [
    "AI",
    "Machine Learning"
  ],
  "address": "123 Tech Street",
  "annual_revenue": 5000000,
  "total_funding": 10000000,
  "technologies": [
    "Python",
    "Go",
    "React"
  ],
  "city": "New York",
  "state": "NY",
  "country": "USA",
  "linkedin_url": "https://linkedin.com/company/acme",
  "website": "https://acme.com"
}

request.description:
Create a new company record with automatic Elasticsearch indexing.

**Validation Rules**:
- `name`: Required
- `normalized_domain`: Optional, must be valid domain format
- `employees_count`, `annual_revenue`, `total_funding`: Must be non-negative integers
- `linkedin_url`, `website`: Must be valid URL format

**Response**: 201 Created with company data

**See**: [Company API - Create Company](../../connectra/docs/company.md#5-create-company)

exec: console.warn('No API key set. Please set the apiKey collection variable.');
// Save UUIDs from response if available
// Response might not be JSON or might not have UUID

request.description:
Update an existing company record by UUID with automatic Elasticsearch reindexing.

**Request Body**: All fields optional, provide only fields to update

**Response**: 200 OK with updated company data

**Error**: 404 Not Found if company doesn't exist

**See**: [Company API - Update Company](../../connectra/docs/company.md#6-update-company)

exec: console.warn('No API key set. Please set the apiKey collection variable.');
// Save UUIDs from response if available
// Response might not be JSON or might not have UUID

request.description:
Soft delete a company record by UUID (sets `deleted_at` timestamp).

**Response**: 200 OK

**Error**: 404 Not Found if company doesn't exist

**Note**: Deleted companies are removed from Elasticsearch index but retained in PostgreSQL with `deleted_at` timestamp for audit purposes.

**See**: [Company API - Delete Company](../../connectra/docs/company.md#7-delete-company)

exec: console.warn('No API key set. Please set the apiKey collection variable.');
// Save UUIDs from response if available
// Response might not be JSON or might not have UUID

request.description:
Create a new company or update an existing one (identified by UUID or normalized_domain).

**Upsert Logic**:
1. If company with matching UUID exists → update
2. If company with matching normalized_domain exists → update
3. Otherwise → create new company

**Response**: 200 OK with company data

**See**: [Company API - Upsert Company](../../connectra/docs/company.md#8-upsert-company)

exec: console.warn('No API key set. Please set the apiKey collection variable.');
// Save UUIDs from response if available
// Response might not be JSON or might not have UUID

request.description:
Efficiently create or update multiple companies in a single request.

**Validation**:
- `companies`: Required array with minimum 1 item
- Each company must have `name` field
- UUIDs generated automatically if not provided

**Response**: 200 OK with count of processed companies

**Performance**:
- Uses PostgreSQL `ON CONFLICT` for atomic upsert
- Batch Elasticsearch indexing for efficiency
- Can handle 1000+ records per request

**Best Practices**:
- Batch size: 100-500 records recommended
- Validate data before sending
- Monitor response times for large batches

**See**: [Company API - Bulk Upsert Companies](../../connectra/docs/company.md#9-bulk-upsert-companies)

item.description: Companies API endpoints for searching, filtering, and retrieving company data. Uses hybrid search approach combining Elasticsearch for fast filtering and PostgreSQL for detailed data retrieval.

item.name: Contacts

request.description:
Search and retrieve contacts based on VQL (Vivek Query Language) filter criteria. Contacts can optionally include associated company information.

**Note**: This is a legacy route (not under /api/v2/).

Get the total count of contacts matching the filter criteria.

**Note**: This is a legacy route (not under /api/v2/).

Retrieve all available filter metadata for contacts.

**Note**: This is a legacy route (not under /api/v2/).

Retrieve available values for a specific filter (useful for dropdowns/autocomplete).

**Note**: This is a legacy route (not under /api/v2/).

exec: console.warn('No API key set. Please set the apiKey collection variable.');
// Save UUIDs from response if available
// Response might not be JSON or might not have UUID

request.description:
Create a new contact record with automatic Elasticsearch indexing.

**Validation Rules**:
- `first_name`: Required
- `last_name`: Required
- `email`: Required, must be valid email format
- `company_id`: Optional, must be valid UUID format
- `linkedin_url`, `facebook_url`, `twitter_url`, `website`: Must be valid URL format
- `uuid`: Optional (generated if not provided)

**Response**: 201 Created with contact data

**Automatic Indexing**: The contact is automatically indexed in Elasticsearch for search capabilities.

**See**: [Contact API - Create Contact](../../connectra/docs/contacts.md#5-create-contact)

exec: console.warn('No API key set. Please set the apiKey collection variable.');
// Save UUIDs from response if available
// Response might not be JSON or might not have UUID

request.description:
Update an existing contact record by UUID with automatic Elasticsearch reindexing.

**Request Body**: All fields optional, provide only fields to update

**Response**: 200 OK with updated contact data

**Error**: 404 Not Found if contact doesn't exist

**See**: [Contact API - Update Contact](../../connectra/docs/contacts.md#6-update-contact)

exec: console.warn('No API key set. Please set the apiKey collection variable.');
// Save UUIDs from response if available
// Response might not be JSON or might not have UUID

request.description:
Soft delete a contact record by UUID (sets `deleted_at` timestamp).

**Response**: 200 OK

**Error**: 404 Not Found if contact doesn't exist

**Note**: Deleted contacts are removed from Elasticsearch index but retained in PostgreSQL with `deleted_at` timestamp for audit purposes.

**See**: [Contact API - Delete Contact](../../connectra/docs/contacts.md#7-delete-contact)

exec: console.warn('No API key set. Please set the apiKey collection variable.');
// Save UUIDs from response if available
// Response might not be JSON or might not have UUID

request.description:
Create a new contact or update an existing one (identified by UUID or email).

**Upsert Logic**:
1. If contact with matching UUID exists → update
2. If contact with matching email exists → update
3. Otherwise → create new contact

**Response**: 200 OK with contact data

**See**: [Contact API - Upsert Contact](../../connectra/docs/contacts.md#8-upsert-contact)

exec: console.warn('No API key set. Please set the apiKey collection variable.');
// Save UUIDs from response if available
// Response might not be JSON or might not have UUID

request.description:
Efficiently create or update multiple contacts in a single request.

**Validation**:
- `contacts`: Required array with minimum 1 item
- Each contact must have `first_name`, `last_name`, and `email` fields
- UUIDs generated automatically if not provided

**Response**: 200 OK with count of processed contacts

**Performance**:
- Uses PostgreSQL `ON CONFLICT` for atomic upsert
- Batch Elasticsearch indexing for efficiency
- Can handle 1000+ records per request

**Best Practices**:
- Batch size: 100-500 records recommended
- Validate data before sending (especially email formats)
- Monitor response times for large batches
- Use for data imports and synchronization

**See**: [Contact API - Bulk Upsert Contacts](../../connectra/docs/contacts.md#9-bulk-upsert-contacts)

exec: console.warn('No API key set. Please set the apiKey collection variable.');
// Save UUIDs from response if available
// Response might not be JSON or might not have UUID

request.description:
Create a new contact record with automatic Elasticsearch indexing.

**Validation Rules**:
- `first_name`: Required
- `last_name`: Required
- `email`: Required, must be valid email format
- `company_id`: Optional, must be valid UUID format
- `linkedin_url`, `facebook_url`, `twitter_url`, `website`: Must be valid URL format
- `uuid`: Optional (generated if not provided)

**Response**: 201 Created with contact data

**Automatic Indexing**: The contact is automatically indexed in Elasticsearch for search capabilities.

**See**: [Contact API - Create Contact](../../connectra/docs/contacts.md#5-create-contact)

request.description:
Update an existing contact record by UUID with automatic Elasticsearch reindexing.

**Request Body**: All fields optional, provide only fields to update

**Response**: 200 OK with updated contact data

**Error**: 404 Not Found if contact doesn't exist

**See**: [Contact API - Update Contact](../../connectra/docs/contacts.md#6-update-contact)

exec: console.warn('No API key set. Please set the apiKey collection variable.');
// Save UUIDs from response if available
// Response might not be JSON or might not have UUID

request.description:
Soft delete a contact record by UUID (sets `deleted_at` timestamp).

**Response**: 200 OK

**Error**: 404 Not Found if contact doesn't exist

**Note**: Deleted contacts are removed from Elasticsearch index but retained in PostgreSQL with `deleted_at` timestamp for audit purposes.

**See**: [Contact API - Delete Contact](../../connectra/docs/contacts.md#7-delete-contact)

exec: console.warn('No API key set. Please set the apiKey collection variable.');
// Save UUIDs from response if available
// Response might not be JSON or might not have UUID

request.description:
Create a new contact or update an existing one (identified by UUID or email).

**Upsert Logic**:
1. If contact with matching UUID exists → update
2. If contact with matching email exists → update
3. Otherwise → create new contact

**Response**: 200 OK with contact data

**See**: [Contact API - Upsert Contact](../../connectra/docs/contacts.md#8-upsert-contact)

exec: console.warn('No API key set. Please set the apiKey collection variable.');
// Save UUIDs from response if available
// Response might not be JSON or might not have UUID

request.description:
Efficiently create or update multiple contacts in a single request.

**Validation**:
- `contacts`: Required array with minimum 1 item
- Each contact must have `first_name`, `last_name`, and `email` fields
- UUIDs generated automatically if not provided

**Response**: 200 OK with count of processed contacts

**Performance**:
- Uses PostgreSQL `ON CONFLICT` for atomic upsert
- Batch Elasticsearch indexing for efficiency
- Can handle 1000+ records per request

**Best Practices**:
- Batch size: 100-500 records recommended
- Validate data before sending (especially email formats)
- Monitor response times for large batches
- Use for data imports and synchronization

**See**: [Contact API - Bulk Upsert Contacts](../../connectra/docs/contacts.md#9-bulk-upsert-contacts)

exec: console.warn('No API key set. Please set the apiKey collection variable.');

item.description: Contacts API endpoints for searching, filtering, and retrieving contact data. Uses hybrid search approach combining Elasticsearch for fast filtering and PostgreSQL for detailed data retrieval. Contacts can optionally include associated company information.

variable.description: Base URL for v1 API endpoints
Base URL for v2 API endpoints
Base URL for v3 API endpoints
Base URL for v4 API endpoints
JWT access token (automatically set after login/register)
JWT refresh token (automatically set after login/register)
